title: Mouse cursor jumping about and sometimes being swallowed up in team fights
body: Basically, lately I've noticed that my mouse cursor will jump around during team fights. My FPS goes down and suddenly my cursor will just jump around, or disappear from view altogether. Is anyone else experiencing this? It seems to have been happening more and more lately.

replies.body:
It definitely sounds like something is causing your mouse to act up!  My first suggestion would be to try another mouse to rule out any possibilities with the hardware itself.  Should the issue continue then there could also be a configuration problem causing this.  A config reset might help!

Log into the game client.
Navigate to C:\Riot Games\League of Legends\Config
Delete the file  named **game.cfg** and **persistedsettings.json**
Go into a custom game and verify that settings have saved properly.  Leave game to sync settings. 

Test it in a custom and let me know if it does the trick.
